Module project.ccprog3mco2gui
Package project.ccprog3mco2gui.model

Class RegularVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
project.ccprog3mco2gui.model.RegularVendingMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpecialVendingMachine
public class RegularVendingMachine extends Object
Represents a regular vending machine.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularVendingMachine

      public RegularVendingMachine(String name)
      Creates a new RegularVendingMachine with the given name. The machine is initialized with a specific number of slots and denominations, and the total sales and transactions are initialized to zero.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the RegularVendingMachine

      public boolean hasSufficientChange(double amount)
      Checks if the vending machine has sufficient change for a given amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to check
      Returns:
      true if the vending machine has sufficient change, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • collectMoney

      public double collectMoney()
      Collects all the money from the vending machine.
      Returns:
      the total money within the vending machine

      Resets the transactions and total sales of the vending machine.

    • restockWithNewItem

      public void restockWithNewItem(int slotIndex, Item newItem, int newQuantity)
      Restocks the specified slot with a new item and quantity, if the slot is not already stocked.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - The index of the slot to be restocked.

    • restockWithQuantity

      public void restockWithQuantity(int slotIndex, int newQuantity)
      Restocks the specified slot with a new quantity.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - The index of the slot to be restocked.
      newQuantity - The new quantity to be restocked.

    • updateDenominationsCount

      public void updateDenominationsCount(List<Denomination> dispensedChange)
      Updates the count of denominations in the vending machine after a transaction.
      Parameters:
      dispensedChange - the list of denominations dispensed as change

    • dispenseItem

      public String dispenseItem(int slotNumber, double payment, int quantityToDispense)
      Dispenses the selected item and processes the transaction.
      Parameters:
      slotNumber - The slot number of the item to purchase.
      payment - The payment amount made by the user.
      quantityToDispense - The quantity of the item to dispense.

    • hasEmptySlot

      public boolean hasEmptySlot()
      Checks if there is any empty slot available in the vending machine.
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one empty slot, false otherwise.

      public void addPaymentDenominations(Double[] denominationValues)
      Adds payment denominations to the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      denominationValues - the values of the denominations to add
